h2_title: Black Wind King Boss Fight and Guide
content: The self-imposed King of the Black Wind Mountain has been waiting for you, and though he’s only facing you now in his human form, he’s got a lot of powerful attacks to watch out for.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_King.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind King', specifically from the subsection 'Black Wind King Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The self-imposed King of the Black Wind Mountain has been waiting for you, and though he’s only facing you now in his human form, he’s got a lot of powerful attacks to watch out for.
